Ability: Grants friendlyMegalodonsin a radius of 18 around the Megaarena Projector an energy shield which instantly kills enemy infantry (exceptheroes) that comes in contact with, increases their speed by 1 and renders them immune to EMP
The effect takes 100 frames (6.7 in-game seconds) to apply and lingers for 110 frames (7.3 in-game seconds)
